REVISION
Important Safety Information
ATTENTION: IF YOU ARE SEATED IN AN EXIT SEAT AND CANNOT UNDERSTAND CREW COMMANDS OR
THE INFORMATION ON THIS CARD, PLEASE CONTACT A FLIGHT ATTENDANT.

ATENCION, SI USTED ESTÁ SENTADO EN UNA FILA DE SALIDA Y NO ENTIENDE LAS INDICACIONES DE
LA TRIPULACIÓN O LA INFORMACIÓN EN ESTA TARJETA, POR FAVOR PÓNGASE EN CONTACTO CON
ALGUIEN DE LA TRIPULACIÓN DE SERVICIO.

In the event of an emergency, if you are seated in an exit seat you may be called upon
to open the exit and assist fellow passengers in exiting the airplane if a crew member
is not available to do so. Please review the following information carefully.
Exit Seat Criteria:
For the benefit of all passengers, Federal Law
requires that passengers seated in an exit seat meet
the following criteria:
